law.text: [ Text of section effective until March 27, 2011. Repealed by 2011, 3, Sec. 131.] The department may establish and maintain in such cities as may be selected by it after investigation, with the approval of the governor and council, employment offices for the purpose of bringing together those seeking employment and those desiring to employ, and may maintain such offices now established. The commissioner shall make an annual report as to free employment offices.
